name: Wh1t3h1v3
description: Wh1t3H1v3 is a trading card game on Ethereum in a futuristic sci-fi universe drawing on lore themed around Alice in Wonderland and the Matrix. Players can collect cards, build out their deck and battle against users to win prizes. The HIVE token sits at the centre of the game as a utility token, which can be earned by collecting and staking cards and playing the game. Come join the Hive!!!
